description: Moloa might translate to “lazy,” but they like to think “laidback” is a better fit. From the boardwalk to boardroom, the dapper Moloa, in antiqued waxed nubuck leather, can handle a serious meeting or a spontaneous night out. Moloa is a true master of casual versatility.
name: Olukai Moloa - Mens

specs.value: Antiqued, waxed nubuck leather with soft, moisture-wicking microfiber lining and elastic gore panels for comfort and customized fit
Dual-density PU footbed with a gel insert and a soft microfiber footbed cover. Removable and washable
All-weather, non-marking rubber outsole is wrapped with premium full-grain leather and features outsole pods for flexibility and traction
